quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"inefficacious"与形近词"inefficient"（效率低的）混淆，或通过词根误判为"无能力的"。
quiz_item.sentence: The new drug was found to be **inefficacious** in treating the disease, as most patients showed no improvement after a month of use.

option.definition: 效率低的（not working in a way that saves time or energy）
无能力的（lacking the ability to do something）
不持久的（not lasting for a long time）
无效的（not producing the desired effect）
